text: The GOP Is Already Clashing Over Trump's VP Pick  —  While Trump tries to sew up the nomination, his camp is already feuding about his future running mate — and hoping it isn't Nikki Haley.  —  As the vice-presidential field continues to develop, many consider what a Nikki Haley vice presidency could mean for the GOP.

Days before New Hampshire primary, most Republicans would be satisfied with Trump as 2024 nominee: POLL  —  He also has a wide lead over DeSantis and Haley on a range of attributes.  —  Republican presidential candidate former President Donald Trump speaks at a campaign event in Atkinson, N.H., on Jan. 16, 2024.
